title: #422 RHOBH: All That Glitters Is Not Gold
description:
This week on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Dorit provides endless entertainment. First she adamantly denies Rinna's coke allegations, and then she shows up to Vanderpump's Rosé party looking an Oscar melted on her head. We're here to break it all down: from Eden's friendship ring to Erika's soap opera debut. Come listen and tell your friends!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
